mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notices WHERE start_date <= CURRENT_DATE AND ( end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= CURRENT_DATE )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices ( start_date, end_date, display_range, content, link, created_by, created_at ) VALUES ( #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{displayRange}, #{content}, #{link}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
